parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Third person singular active present of deo; also deon deh-on'; neuter active participle of the same; both used impersonally; it is Necessary.
To muzzle, silence, stop the mouth. From epi and stoma; to put something over the mouth, i.e. to silence.
Accusative case of charis as preposition; through favor of, i.e. On account of.
Base, disgraceful. From the same as aischunomai; shameful, i.e. Base.
Gain, advantage, profit. Of uncertain affinity; gain.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To overturn (lit. or met.), subvert, overthrow, corrupt. From ana and the base of trope; to overturn.
All, the whole, entire, complete. A primary word; 'whole' or 'all', i.e. Complete, especially as noun or adverb.
A dwelling; by implication, a family.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To teach, direct, admonish. A prolonged form of a primary verb dao; to teach.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Plural
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Third person singular active present of deo; also deon deh-on'; neuter active participle of the same; both used impersonally; it is Necessary.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
